pkgmetadata.longdescription: # arg_robotics_tools> A toolset for navigation (no ros) created by arg lab.This file will become your README and also the index of your documentation.Website : https://arg-nctu.github.io/arg_robotics_tools/## Install`pip install arg_robotics_tools`We can install it locally :(or use this if above command failed)`git clone git@github.com:ARG-NCTU/arg_robotics_tools.git``cd ~/arg_robotics_tools``pip install -e .`## How to useFill me in please! Don't forget code examples:`cd ~/arg_robotics_tools``source docker_run.sh``source colab_jupyter.sh`click ctrl and the url to open browser, then you should see local jupyter notebook!inside jupyter notebook, click .ipynp and run cells## How to pushclear all notebook outputin docker : $ `make`in your laptop, do your git push
